GE07mbh_10_u:295: 10,003.033c virātre pramathiṣyāmi paśor iva śiro balāt
GE07mbh_10_u:299: 10,003.035a adya pāñcālasenāṃ tāṃ nihatya niśi sauptike
GE07mbh_10_u:304: 10,004.001a diṣṭyā te pratikartavye matir jāteyam acyuta
GE07mbh_10_u:305: 10,004.001c na tvā vārayituṃ śakto vajrapāṇir api svayam
GE07mbh_10_u:306: 10,004.002a anuyāsyāvahe tvāṃ tu prabhāte sahitāv ubhau
GE07mbh_10_u:308: 10,004.003a ahaṃ tvām anuyāsyāmi kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:309: 10,004.003c parān abhimukhaṃ yāntaṃ rathāv āsthāya daṃśitau
GE07mbh_10_u:310: 10,004.004a āvābhyāṃ sahitaḥ śatrūñ śvo 'si hantā samāgame
GE07mbh_10_u:312: 10,004.005a śaktas tvam asi vikrāntuṃ viśramasva niśām imām
GE07mbh_10_u:313: 10,004.005c ciraṃ te jāgratas tāta svapa tāvan niśām imām
GE07mbh_10_u:314: 10,004.006a viśrāntaś ca vinidraś ca svasthacittaś ca mānada
GE07mbh_10_u:315: 10,004.006c sametya samare śatrūn vadhiṣyasi na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:316: 10,004.007a na hi tvā rathināṃ śreṣṭha pragṛhītavarāyudham
GE07mbh_10_u:317: 10,004.007c jetum utsahate kaś cid api deveṣu pāvakiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:318: 10,004.008a kṛpeṇa sahitaṃ yāntaṃ yuktaṃ ca kṛtavarmaṇā
GE07mbh_10_u:319: 10,004.008c ko drauṇiṃ yudhi saṃrabdhaṃ yodhayed api devarāṭ
GE07mbh_10_u:322: 10,004.010a tava hy astrāṇi divyāni mama caiva na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:324: 10,004.011a te vayaṃ sahitās tāta sarvāñ śatrūn samāgatān
GE07mbh_10_u:325: 10,004.011c prasahya samare hatvā prītiṃ prāpsyāma puṣkalām
GE07mbh_10_u:326: 10,004.011e viśramasva tvam avyagraḥ svapa cemāṃ niśāṃ sukham
GE07mbh_10_u:327: 10,004.012a ahaṃ ca kṛtavarmā ca prayāntaṃ tvāṃ narottama
GE07mbh_10_u:329: 10,004.012e rathinaṃ tvarayā yāntaṃ rathāv āsthāya daṃśitau
GE07mbh_10_u:330: 10,004.013a sa gatvā śibiraṃ teṣāṃ nāma viśrāvya cāhave
GE07mbh_10_u:331: 10,004.013c tataḥ kartāsi śatrūṇāṃ yudhyatāṃ kadanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_10_u:332: 10,004.014a kṛtvā ca kadanaṃ teṣāṃ prabhāte vimale 'hani
GE07mbh_10_u:334: 10,004.015a tvaṃ hi śakto raṇe jetuṃ pāñcālānāṃ varūthinīm
GE07mbh_10_u:336: 10,004.016a mayā tvāṃ sahitaṃ saṃkhye guptaṃ ca kṛtavarmaṇā
GE07mbh_10_u:337: 10,004.016c na saheta vibhuḥ sākṣād vajrapāṇir api svayam
GE07mbh_10_u:338: 10,004.017a na cāhaṃ samare tāta kṛtavarmā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_10_u:339: 10,004.017c anirjitya raṇe pāṇḍūn vyapayāsyāva karhi cit
GE07mbh_10_u:340: 10,004.018a hatvā ca samare kṣudrān pāñcālān pāṇḍubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_10_u:341: 10,004.018c nivartiṣyāmahe sarve hatā vā svargagā vayam
GE07mbh_10_u:342: 10,004.019a sarvopāyaiḥ sahāyās te prabhāte vayam eva hi
GE07mbh_10_u:344: 10,004.020a evam uktas tato drauṇir mātulena hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:345: 10,004.020c abravīn mātulaṃ rājan krodhād udvṛtya locane
GE07mbh_10_u:347: 10,004.021c arthāṃś cintayataś cāpi kāmayānasya vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:348: 10,004.022a tad idaṃ samanuprāptaṃ paśya me 'dya catuṣṭayam
GE07mbh_10_u:349: 10,004.022c yasya bhāgaś caturtho me svapnam ahnāya nāśayet
GE07mbh_10_u:350: 10,004.023a kiṃ nāma duḥkhaṃ loke 'smin pitur vadham anusmaran
GE07mbh_10_u:351: 10,004.023c hṛdayaṃ nirdahan me 'dya rātryahāni na śāmyati
GE07mbh_10_u:352: 10,004.024a yathā ca nihataḥ pāpaiḥ pitā mama viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:353: 10,004.024c pratyakṣam api te sarvaṃ tan me marmāṇi kṛntati
GE07mbh_10_u:354: 10,004.025a kathaṃ hi mādṛśo loke muhūrtam api jīvati
GE07mbh_10_u:355: 10,004.025c droṇo hateti yad vācaḥ pāñcālānāṃ śṛṇomy aham
GE07mbh_10_u:357: 10,004.026c sa me pitṛvadhād vadhyaḥ pāñcālā ye ca saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:358: 10,004.027a vilāpo bhagnasakthasya yas tu rājño mayā śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:359: 10,004.027c sa punar hṛdayaṃ kasya krūrasyāpi na nirdahet
GE07mbh_10_u:360: 10,004.028a kasya hy akaruṇasyāpi netrābhyām aśru nāvrajet
GE07mbh_10_u:361: 10,004.028c nṛpater bhagnasakthasya śrutvā tādṛg vacaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:362: 10,004.029a yaś cāyaṃ mitrapakṣo me mayi jīvati nirjitaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:363: 10,004.029c śokaṃ me vardhayaty eṣa vārivega ivārṇavam
GE07mbh_10_u:364: 10,004.029e ekāgramanaso me 'dya kuto nidrā kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_10_u:367: 10,004.031a na cāsmi śakyaḥ saṃyantum asmāt kāryāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_10_u:368: 10,004.031c na taṃ paśyāmi loke 'smin yo māṃ kāryān nivartayet
GE07mbh_10_u:369: 10,004.031e iti me niścitā buddhir eṣā sādhumatā ca me
GE07mbh_10_u:370: 10,004.032a vārttikaiḥ kathyamānas tu mitrāṇāṃ me parābhavaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:371: 10,004.032c pāṇḍavānāṃ ca vijayo hṛdayaṃ dahatīva me
GE07mbh_10_u:372: 10,004.033a ahaṃ tu kadanaṃ kṛtvā śatrūṇām adya sauptike
GE07mbh_10_u:373: 10,004.033c tato viśramitā caiva svaptā ca vigatajvaraḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:376: 10,005.001c nālaṃ vedayituṃ kṛtsnau dharmārthāv iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:377: 10,005.002a tathaiva tāvan medhāvī vinayaṃ yo na śikṣati
GE07mbh_10_u:378: 10,005.002c na ca kiṃ cana jānāti so 'pi dharmārthaniścayam
GE07mbh_10_u:379: 10,005.002c*0014_01 ciraṃ hy api jaḍaḥ śūraḥ paṇḍitaṃ paryupāsya ha
GE07mbh_10_u:380: 10,005.002c*0014_02 na sa dharmān vijānāti darvī sūparasān iva
GE07mbh_10_u:381: 10,005.002c*0014_03 muhūrtam api taṃ prājñaḥ paṇḍitaṃ paryupāsya ha
GE07mbh_10_u:382: 10,005.002c*0014_04 kṣipraṃ dharmān vijānāti jihvā sūparasān iva
GE07mbh_10_u:383: 10,005.003a śuśrūṣus tv eva medhāvī puruṣo niyatendriyaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:384: 10,005.003c jānīyād āgamān sarvān grāhyaṃ ca na virodhayet
GE07mbh_10_u:385: 10,005.004a aneyas tv avamānī yo durātmā pāpapūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:389: 10,005.006a yathā hy uccāvacair vākyaiḥ kṣiptacitto niyamyate
GE07mbh_10_u:390: 10,005.006c tathaiva suhṛdā śakyo naśakyas tv avasīdati
GE07mbh_10_u:391: 10,005.007a tathaiva suhṛdaṃ prājñaṃ kurvāṇaṃ karma pāpakam
GE07mbh_10_u:393: 10,005.008a sa kalyāṇe matiṃ kṛtvā niyamyātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_10_u:394: 10,005.008c kuru me vacanaṃ tāta yena paścān na tapyase
GE07mbh_10_u:395: 10,005.009a na vadhaḥ pūjyate loke suptānām iha dharmataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:397: 10,005.010a ye ca brūyus tavāsmīti ye ca syuḥ śaraṇāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:398: 10,005.010c vimuktamūrdhajā ye ca ye cāpi hatavāhanāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:400: 10,005.011c viśvastā rajanīṃ sarve pretā iva vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:402: 10,005.012c vyaktaṃ sa narake majjed agādhe vipule 'plave
GE07mbh_10_u:403: 10,005.013a sarvāstraviduṣāṃ loke śreṣṭhas tvam asi viśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:404: 10,005.013c na ca te jātu loke 'smin susūkṣmam api kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_10_u:405: 10,005.014a tvaṃ punaḥ sūryasaṃkāśaḥ śvobhūta udite ravau
GE07mbh_10_u:408: 10,005.015c śukle raktam iva nyastaṃ bhaved iti matir mama
GE07mbh_10_u:410: 10,005.016a evam etad yathāttha tvam anuśāsmīha mātula
GE07mbh_10_u:411: 10,005.016c tais tu pūrvamayaṃ setuḥ śatadhā vidalīkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:414: 10,005.018a karṇaś ca patite cakre rathasya rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:420: 10,005.021a duryodhanaś ca bhīmena sametya gadayā mṛdhe
GE07mbh_10_u:424: 10,005.023a vilāpo bhagnasakthasya yo me rājñaḥ pariśrutaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:425: 10,005.023c vārttikānāṃ kathayatāṃ sa me marmāṇi kṛntati
GE07mbh_10_u:427: 10,005.024c tān evaṃ bhinnamaryādān kiṃ bhavān na vigarhati
GE07mbh_10_u:428: 10,005.024c*0015_01 yāsyāmy apacitiṃ rājñaḥ kauravasya pitus tathā
GE07mbh_10_u:429: 10,005.025a pitṛhantṝn ahaṃ hatvā pāñcālān niśi sauptike
GE07mbh_10_u:430: 10,005.025c kāmaṃ kīṭaḥ pataṃgo vā janma prāpya bhavāmi vai
GE07mbh_10_u:431: 10,005.026a tvare cāham anenādya yad idaṃ me cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_10_u:432: 10,005.026c tasya me tvaramāṇasya kuto nidrā kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_10_u:433: 10,005.027a na sa jātaḥ pumāṃl loke kaś cin na ca bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_10_u:434: 10,005.027c yo me vyāvartayed etāṃ vadhe teṣāṃ kṛtāṃ matim
GE07mbh_10_u:439: 10,005.029c kim ayaṃ syandano yuktaḥ kiṃ ca kāryaṃ cikīrṣitam
GE07mbh_10_u:440: 10,005.030a ekasārthaṃ prayātau svas tvayā saha nararṣabha
GE07mbh_10_u:442: 10,005.031a aśvatthāmā tu saṃkruddhaḥ pitur vadham anusmaran
GE07mbh_10_u:446: 10,005.033a taṃ tathaiva haniṣyāmi nyastavarmāṇam adya vai
GE07mbh_10_u:448: 10,005.034a kathaṃ ca nihataḥ pāpaḥ pāñcālaḥ paśuvan mayā
GE07mbh_10_u:449: 10,005.034c śastrāhavajitāṃ lokān prāpnuyād iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:452: 10,005.036a ity uktvā ratham āsthāya prāyād abhimukhaḥ parān
GE07mbh_10_u:453: 10,005.036c tam anvagāt kṛpo rājan kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:454: 10,005.037a te prayātā vyarocanta parān abhimukhās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:456: 10,005.038a yayuś ca śibiraṃ teṣāṃ saṃprasuptajanaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_10_u:457: 10,005.038c dvāradeśaṃ tu saṃprāpya drauṇis tasthau rathottame
GE07mbh_10_u:460: 10,005.038c*0016_02 niścitau tu vadhe teṣāṃ pāñcālānāṃ mahāvratau
GE07mbh_10_u:463: 10,005.038c*0016_05 tāvat kāryam idaṃ yuktaṃ sādhayāmy aham añjasā
GE07mbh_10_u:464: 10,005.038c*0016_06 evaṃ tu saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā ekamūrtidharau sthitau
GE07mbh_10_u:466: 10,006.001a dvāradeśe tato drauṇim avasthitam avekṣya tau
GE07mbh_10_u:467: 10,006.001c akurvatāṃ bhojakṛpau kiṃ saṃjaya vadasva me
GE07mbh_10_u:469: 10,006.002a kṛtavarmāṇam āmantrya kṛpaṃ ca sa mahāratham
GE07mbh_10_u:479: 10,006.007a naiva tasya vapuḥ śakyaṃ pravaktuṃ veṣa eva vā
GE07mbh_10_u:480: 10,006.007c sarvathā tu tad ālakṣya sphuṭeyur api parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:481: 10,006.008a tasyāsyān nāsikābhyāṃ ca śravaṇābhyāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:487: 10,006.011a drauṇimuktāñ śarāṃs tāṃs tu tad bhūtaṃ mahad agrasat
GE07mbh_10_u:489: 10,006.011c*0017_01 agrasat tāṃs tathā bhūtaṃ drauṇinā prahitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_10_u:490: 10,006.012a aśvatthāmā tu saṃprekṣya tāñ śaraughān nirarthakān
GE07mbh_10_u:493: 10,006.013c yugānte sūryam āhatya maholkeva divaś cyutā
GE07mbh_10_u:496: 10,006.015a tataḥ khaḍgavaraṃ dhīmān bhūtāya prāhiṇot tadā
GE07mbh_10_u:497: 10,006.015c sa tadāsādya bhūtaṃ vai vilayaṃ tūlavad yayau
GE07mbh_10_u:498: 10,006.016a tataḥ sa kupito drauṇir indraketunibhāṃ gadām
GE07mbh_10_u:499: 10,006.016c jvalantīṃ prāhiṇot tasmai bhūtaṃ tām api cāgrasat
GE07mbh_10_u:504: 10,006.019a bruvatām apriyaṃ pathyaṃ suhṛdāṃ na śṛṇoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:505: 10,006.019c sa śocaty āpadaṃ prāpya yathāham ativartya tau
GE07mbh_10_u:507: 10,006.020c sa pathaḥ pracyuto dharmyāt kupathaṃ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_10_u:511: 10,006.022c ity evaṃ gurubhiḥ pūrvam upadiṣṭaṃ nṛṇāṃ sadā
GE07mbh_10_u:515: 10,006.024c yad udyamya mahat kṛtyaṃ bhayād api nivartate
GE07mbh_10_u:516: 10,006.025a aśakyaṃ caiva kaḥ kartuṃ śaktaḥ śaktibalād iha
GE07mbh_10_u:517: 10,006.025c na hi daivād garīyo vai mānuṣaṃ karma kathyate
GE07mbh_10_u:518: 10,006.026a mānuṣaṃ kurvataḥ karma yadi daivān na sidhyati
GE07mbh_10_u:519: 10,006.026c sa pathaḥ pracyuto dharmyād vipadaṃ pratipadyate
GE07mbh_10_u:521: 10,006.027c yad ārabhya kriyāṃ kāṃ cid bhayād iha nivartate
GE07mbh_10_u:522: 10,006.028a tad idaṃ duṣpraṇītena bhayaṃ māṃ samupasthitam
GE07mbh_10_u:523: 10,006.028c na hi droṇasutaḥ saṃkhye nivarteta kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_10_u:524: 10,006.029a idaṃ ca sumahad bhūtaṃ daivadaṇḍam ivodyatam
GE07mbh_10_u:525: 10,006.029c na caitad abhijānāmi cintayann api sarvathā
GE07mbh_10_u:526: 10,006.030a dhruvaṃ yeyam adharme me pravṛttā kaluṣā matiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:527: 10,006.030c tasyāḥ phalam idaṃ ghoraṃ pratighātāya dṛśyate
GE07mbh_10_u:528: 10,006.031a tad idaṃ daivavihitaṃ mama saṃkhye nivartanam
GE07mbh_10_u:529: 10,006.031c nānyatra daivād udyantum iha śakyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_10_u:530: 10,006.032a so 'ham adya mahādevaṃ prapadye śaraṇaṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_10_u:531: 10,006.032c daivadaṇḍam imaṃ ghoraṃ sa hi me nāśayiṣyati
GE07mbh_10_u:534: 10,006.034a sa hi devo 'tyagād devāṃs tapasā vikrameṇa ca
GE07mbh_10_u:537: 10,007.001a sa evaṃ cintayitvā tu droṇaputro viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_10_u:540: 10,007.002a ugraṃ sthāṇuṃ śivaṃ rudraṃ śarvam īśānam īśvaram
GE07mbh_10_u:541: 10,007.002c giriśaṃ varadaṃ devaṃ bhavaṃ bhāvanam avyayam
GE07mbh_10_u:542: 10,007.003a śitikaṇṭham ajaṃ śakraṃ krathaṃ kratuharaṃ haram
GE07mbh_10_u:550: 10,007.007a śukraṃ viśvasṛjaṃ brahma brahmacāriṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_10_u:556: 10,007.010a paraṃ parebhyaḥ paramaṃ paraṃ yasmān na vidyate
GE07mbh_10_u:560: 10,007.012a imāṃ cāpy āpadaṃ ghorāṃ tarāmy adya sudustarām
GE07mbh_10_u:562: 10,007.013a iti tasya vyavasitaṃ jñātvā tyāgātmakaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:564: 10,007.014a tasyāṃ vedyāṃ tadā rājaṃś citrabhānur ajāyata
GE07mbh_10_u:565: 10,007.014c dyāṃ diśo vidiśaḥ khaṃ ca jvālābhir abhipūrayan
GE07mbh_10_u:574: 10,007.018a*0019_01 śataśaś ca sahasrākṣās tathaiva ca ghaṭodarāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:580: 10,007.021a nirmāṃsāḥ kokavaktrāś ca śyenavaktrāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_10_u:585: 10,007.023a śaṅkhābhāḥ śaṅkhavaktrāś ca śaṅkhakarṇās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_10_u:603: 10,007.030c nīlāṅgāḥ kamalāṅgāś ca muṇḍavaktrās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_10_u:607: 10,007.032c laṅghayantaḥ plavantaś ca valgantaś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:609: 10,007.033c mattā iva mahānāgā vinadanto muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:620: 10,007.039a utsaheraṃś ca ye hantuṃ bhūtagrāmaṃ caturvidham
GE07mbh_10_u:621: 10,007.039c ye ca vītabhayā nityaṃ harasya bhrukuṭībhaṭāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:624: 10,007.041a prāpyāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryaṃ ye na yānti ca vismayam
GE07mbh_10_u:625: 10,007.041c yeṣāṃ vismayate nityaṃ bhagavān karmabhir haraḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:626: 10,007.042a manovākkarmabhir bhaktair nityam ārādhitaś ca yaiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:628: 10,007.043a pibanto 'sṛgvasās tv anye kruddhā brahmadviṣāṃ sadā
GE07mbh_10_u:629: 10,007.043c caturviṃśātmakaṃ somaṃ ye pibanti ca nityadā
GE07mbh_10_u:630: 10,007.044a śrutena brahmacaryeṇa tapasā ca damena ca
GE07mbh_10_u:632: 10,007.045a yair ātmabhūtair bhagavān pārvatyā ca maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:641: 10,007.049a janayeyur bhayaṃ ye sma trailokyasyāpi darśanāt
GE07mbh_10_u:642: 10,007.049c tān prekṣamāṇo 'pi vyathāṃ na cakāra mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:645: 10,007.051a dhanūṃṣi samidhas tatra pavitrāṇi śitāḥ śarāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:646: 10,007.051c havir ātmavataś cātmā tasmin bhārata karmaṇi
GE07mbh_10_u:649: 10,007.053a taṃ rudraṃ raudrakarmāṇaṃ raudraiḥ karmabhir acyutam
GE07mbh_10_u:651: 10,007.054a imam ātmānam adyāhaṃ jātam āṅgirase kule
GE07mbh_10_u:652: 10,007.054c agnau juhomi bhagavan pratigṛhṇīṣva māṃ balim
GE07mbh_10_u:655: 10,007.056a tvayi sarvāṇi bhūtāni sarvabhūteṣu cāsi vai

GE07mbh_10_u:940: 10,008.113a kiṃ cit prāṇaiś ca puruṣair hataiś cānyaiḥ sahasraśaḥ

GE07mbh_10_u:989: 10,008.136e pāṇinā saha saṃśliṣṭa ekībhūta iva prabho

GE07mbh_10_u:1716: 10,016.035c śuśubhe sa mahārājaḥ sacandra iva parvataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1720: 10,017.001a hateṣu sarvasainyeṣu sauptike tai rathais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1721: 10,017.001c śocan yudhiṣṭhiro rājā dāśārham idam abravīt
GE07mbh_10_u:1723: 10,017.002c drauṇinā nihatāḥ sarve mama putrā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1726: 10,017.004a yasya droṇo maheṣvāso na prādād āhave mukham
GE07mbh_10_u:1727: 10,017.004c taṃ jaghne rathināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ kathaṃ nu saḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1728: 10,017.005a kiṃ nu tena kṛtaṃ karma tathāyuktaṃ nararṣabha
GE07mbh_10_u:1729: 10,017.005c yad ekaḥ śibiraṃ sarvam avadhīn no guroḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1732: 10,017.006c jagāma śaraṇaṃ drauṇir ekas tenāvadhīd bahūn
GE07mbh_10_u:1733: 10,017.007a prasanno hi mahādevo dadyād amaratām api
GE07mbh_10_u:1734: 10,017.007c vīryaṃ ca giriśo dadyād yenendram api śātayet
GE07mbh_10_u:1736: 10,017.008c yāni cāsya purāṇāni karmāṇi vividhāny uta
GE07mbh_10_u:1737: 10,017.009a ādir eṣa hi bhūtānāṃ madhyam antaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_10_u:1738: 10,017.009c viceṣṭate jagac cedaṃ sarvam asyaiva karmaṇā
GE07mbh_10_u:1739: 10,017.010a evaṃ sisṛkṣur bhūtāni dadarśa prathamaṃ vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1745: 10,017.013a so 'bravīt pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśaṃ magnam ambhasi
GE07mbh_10_u:1746: 10,017.013c yadi me nāgrajas tv anyas tataḥ srakṣyāmy ahaṃ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1747: 10,017.014a tam abravīt pitā nāsti tvad anyaḥ puruṣo 'grajaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1748: 10,017.014c sthāṇur eṣa jale magno visrabdhaḥ kuru vai kṛtim
GE07mbh_10_u:1749: 10,017.015a sa bhūtāny asṛjat sapta dakṣādīṃs tu prajāpatīn
GE07mbh_10_u:1750: 10,017.015c yair imaṃ vyakarot sarvaṃ bhūtagrāmaṃ caturvidham
GE07mbh_10_u:1751: 10,017.016a tāḥ sṛṣṭamātrāḥ kṣudhitāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ prajāpatim
GE07mbh_10_u:1754: 10,017.017c ābhyo māṃ bhagavān pātu vṛttir āsāṃ vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_10_u:1755: 10,017.018a tatas tābhyo dadāv annam oṣadhīḥ sthāvarāṇi ca
GE07mbh_10_u:1757: 10,017.019a vihitānnāḥ prajās tās tu jagmus tuṣṭā yathāgatam
GE07mbh_10_u:1759: 10,017.020a bhūtagrāme vivṛddhe tu tuṣṭe lokagurāv api
GE07mbh_10_u:1760: 10,017.020c udatiṣṭhaj jalāj jyeṣṭhaḥ prajāś cemā dadarśa saḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1761: 10,017.021a bahurūpāḥ prajā dṛṣṭvā vivṛddhāḥ svena tejasā
GE07mbh_10_u:1762: 10,017.021c cukrodha bhagavān rudro liṅgaṃ svaṃ cāpy avidhyata
GE07mbh_10_u:1763: 10,017.022a tat praviddhaṃ tadā bhūmau tathaiva pratyatiṣṭhata
GE07mbh_10_u:1764: 10,017.022c tam uvācāvyayo brahmā vacobhiḥ śamayann iva
GE07mbh_10_u:1765: 10,017.023a kiṃ kṛtaṃ salile śarva cirakālaṃ sthitena te
GE07mbh_10_u:1766: 10,017.023c kimarthaṃ caitad utpāṭya bhūmau liṅgaṃ praveritam
GE07mbh_10_u:1768: 10,017.024c prajāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ pareṇemāḥ kiṃ kariṣyāmy anena vai
GE07mbh_10_u:1771: 10,017.026a evam uktvā tu saṃkruddho jagāma vimanā bhavaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1772: 10,017.026c girer muñjavataḥ pādaṃ tapas taptuṃ mahātapāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1776: 10,018.002a kalpayām āsur avyagrā deśān yajñocitāṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1777: 10,018.002c bhāgārhā devatāś caiva yajñiyaṃ dravyam eva ca
GE07mbh_10_u:1778: 10,018.003a tā vai rudram ajānantyo yāthātathyena devatāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1781: 10,018.004c tarasā bhāgam anvicchan dhanur ādau sasarja ha
GE07mbh_10_u:1786: 10,018.007a vaṣaṭkāro 'bhavaj jyā tu dhanuṣas tasya bhārata
GE07mbh_10_u:1788: 10,018.008a tataḥ kruddho mahādevas tad upādāya kārmukam
GE07mbh_10_u:1791: 10,018.009c vivyathe pṛthivī devī parvatāś ca cakampire
GE07mbh_10_u:1792: 10,018.010a na vavau pavanaś caiva nāgnir jajvāla caidhitaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1794: 10,018.011a na babhau bhāskaraś cāpi somaḥ śrīmuktamaṇḍalaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1796: 10,018.012a abhibhūtās tato devā viṣayān na prajajñire
GE07mbh_10_u:1797: 10,018.012c na pratyabhāc ca yajñas tān vedā babhraṃśire tadā
GE07mbh_10_u:1798: 10,018.013a tataḥ sa yajñaṃ raudreṇa vivyādha hṛdi patriṇā
GE07mbh_10_u:1799: 10,018.013c apakrāntas tato yajño mṛgo bhūtvā sapāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1800: 10,018.014a sa tu tenaiva rūpeṇa divaṃ prāpya vyarocata
GE07mbh_10_u:1802: 10,018.015a apakrānte tato yajñe saṃjñā na pratyabhāt surān
GE07mbh_10_u:1803: 10,018.015c naṣṭasaṃjñeṣu deveṣu na prajñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_10_u:1804: 10,018.016a tryambakaḥ savitur bāhū bhagasya nayane tathā
GE07mbh_10_u:1805: 10,018.016c pūṣṇaś ca daśanān kruddho dhanuṣkoṭyā vyaśātayat
GE07mbh_10_u:1806: 10,018.017a prādravanta tato devā yajñāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1807: 10,018.017c ke cit tatraiva ghūrṇanto gatāsava ivābhavan
GE07mbh_10_u:1808: 10,018.018a sa tu vidrāvya tat sarvaṃ śitikaṇṭho 'vahasya ca
GE07mbh_10_u:1810: 10,018.019a tato vāg amarair uktā jyāṃ tasya dhanuṣo 'cchinat
GE07mbh_10_u:1811: 10,018.019c atha tat sahasā rājaṃś chinnajyaṃ visphurad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1813: 10,018.020c śaraṇaṃ saha yajñena prasādaṃ cākarot prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1814: 10,018.021a tataḥ prasanno bhagavān prāsyat kopaṃ jalāśaye
GE07mbh_10_u:1815: 10,018.021c sa jalaṃ pāvako bhūtvā śoṣayaty aniśaṃ prabho
GE07mbh_10_u:1816: 10,018.022a bhagasya nayane caiva bāhū ca savitus tathā
GE07mbh_10_u:1817: 10,018.022c prādāt pūṣṇaś ca daśanān punar yajñaṃ ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_10_u:1818: 10,018.023a tataḥ sarvam idaṃ svasthaṃ babhūva punar eva ha
GE07mbh_10_u:1819: 10,018.023c sarvāṇi ca havīṃṣy asya devā bhāgam akalpayan
GE07mbh_10_u:1820: 10,018.024a tasmin kruddhe 'bhavat sarvam asvasthaṃ bhuvanaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_10_u:1821: 10,018.024c prasanne ca punaḥ svasthaṃ sa prasanno 'sya vīryavān
GE07mbh_10_u:1822: 10,018.025a tatas te nihatāḥ sarve tava putrā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1823: 10,018.025c anye ca bahavaḥ śūrāḥ pāñcālāś ca sahānugāḥ
GE07mbh_10_u:1824: 10,018.026a na tan manasi kartavyaṃ na hi tad drauṇinā kṛtam
